Body: I have Silver-Line tablet SL-1066 model. When I connect USB stick or SD card the tablet always create a folder under the name "LOST.DIR" and the folder is empty.this folder is also appear in my computer when I connect USB or SD card, this is also appear in my computer after the tablet created it. I tried always to delete it, but if I connect the device to the tablet again, it is will recreate the folder. Someone know how to make it never to create this folder again?Thank you!
